title: AI Chatbot
description: An intelligent conversational assistant built with Python and OpenAI API, capable of answering questions, holding small talk, and performing basic tasks.
output_example: Bot: Hi! How can I assist you today?

title: CardioVascular Prediction Model
description: A deep learning model that predicts the likelihood of cardiovascular diseases using patient health data.

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: A recommendation engine that suggests movies based on user preferences and viewing history.
output_example: Recommended: Interstellar, Shutter Island, Top Gun andl all those movies with rating above or equal 7.5

title: Guess the Number Web Game
description: A fun browser-based game where the player guesses the secret number chosen by the computer.

title: Flappy Bird Web Game
description: A clone of the popular Flappy Bird game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Tower Defense Web Game
description: A browser-based tower defense game where players place towers to defend against waves of enemies.

title: Hospital Management System
description: A console-based application to manage hospital records including patient registration, appointments, and billing.

title: Bank Management System
description: A C++ application to manage bank accounts with deposit, withdrawal, and balance inquiry features.

title: Hotel Management System
description: A console based hotel management program that handles booking, check-in, check-out, and billing.

title: Game Launcher
description: A C++ application to play 3 different games from a single console based interface .
